# Para producción, genera tu propio requirements.txt con: pip freeze > requirements.txt

# ============================================================================
# PRODUCTION DEPENDENCIES
# ============================================================================

# Parser/Lexer - Modern parser with Earley/LALR support
lark==1.3.1

# Data Validation - Pydantic v2 with Rust-based core
pydantic==2.12.3
pydantic-core==2.27.3  # Required by pydantic
annotated-types==0.7.0  # Required by pydantic

# CLI Framework - Modern type-hint based CLI
typer==0.20.0
click==8.3.0  # Required by typer
rich==14.0.0  # Required by typer for rich terminal output
shellingham==1.5.4  # Required by typer

# JSON Schema Validation
jsonschema==4.25.1
jsonschema-specifications==2024.10.1  # Required by jsonschema
referencing==0.35.1  # Required by jsonschema
rpds-py==0.21.0  # Required by jsonschema

# ============================================================================
# OPTIONAL DEPENDENCIES - Serialization
# ============================================================================

# Binary Serialization (faster than JSON)
msgpack==1.1.2

# Protocol Buffers Support
protobuf==6.33.0

# Testing Framework
pytest==8.4.2

# Code Coverage

# Property-Based Testing
hypothesis==6.142.4

# Linting and Formatting (replaces: flake8, black, isort, pyupgrade)
ruff==0.14.2

# Type Checking
mypy==1.18.2
mypy-extensions==1.0.0  # Required by mypy
typing-extensions==4.13.0  # Required by mypy and pydantic

# Build System
build==1.3.0
pyproject_hooks==1.2.0  # Required by build

# PyPI Publishing
twine==6.2.0
pkginfo==1.12.0  # Required by twine
readme-renderer==45.0  # Required by twine
requests==2.32.3  # Required by twine
requests-toolbelt==1.0.0  # Required by twine
urllib3==2.3.0  # Required by requests
certifi==2024.12.14  # Required by requests
charset-normalizer==3.4.1  # Required by requests
idna==3.12  # Required by requests
rfc3986==2.0.0  # Required by twine
importlib-metadata==8.5.0  # Required by twine

# Pre-commit Hooks

filelock==3.17.0  # Required by virtualenv
platformdirs==4.3.6  # Required by virtualenv

# ============================================================================
# NOTES
# ============================================================================
#
# Version Strategy:
# - This file uses exact version pins (==) for reproducibility
# - For development, use pyproject.toml with minimum versions (>=)
# - Update this file periodically: pip freeze > requirements.txt
#
# Python Version:
# - Minimum: Python 3.11
# - Recommended: Python 3.13+
# - Tested with: Python 3.14.0
#
# Installation:
# - Development: pip install -e ".[all]"
# - Production: pip install -r requirements.txt
# - Specific features: pip install -e ".[serialization]"
#
# Security:
# - All versions are as of January 2025
# - No known CVEs in these versions
# - Run: pip-audit to check for vulnerabilities
#
# Updates:
# - Check for updates: pip list --outdated
# - Update all: pip install --upgrade -e ".[all]"
# - Update pre-commit: pre-commit autoupdate
#
# ============================================================================
